links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Machin-Like Formulas
formula: a(n) = (1/49)*{13*(n mod 7)+27*[(n+1) mod 7]+34*[(n+2) mod 7]-43*[(n+3) mod 7]+27*[(n+4) mod 7]-22*[(n+5) mod 7]+6*[(n+6) mod 7]}, with n>=0. [_Paolo P. Lava_, Oct 05 2009]From _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Sep 14 2015: (Start)Pi = 16 arctan(1/5) - 4 arctan(1/239) [Machin's formula],arctan(1/239) = arctan(1/70) - arctan(1/99) = arctan(1/408) + arctan(1/577),1/239 = 4649 / 1111111. author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
